about_the_game:
I feel a bit like at a farm here....
Cute Pets is a new DLC pack for Hamster Playground - This time being strongly related to the farm! This set will allow your hamsters to impersonate various cute and adorable animals.
Wake up your hamsters in a whole new reality by decorating their home in a truly cute atmosphere. Perform new tasks and do new jobs, this time on the farm!

Cute Pets DLC includes:
New farm- and animal-related items for the hamster's home;
Costumes that allow hamsters to dress up as their favorite animal
Brand new quests with unique rewards;
New jobs to do for your Hamsters.
